alert.note: Alert for Parker; Tarrant; Wise (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 3:24PM CDT until March 16 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN WISE...NORTHEASTERN PARKER AND WESTERN TARRANT COUNTIES... At 323 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Weatherford, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Weatherford, Benbrook, White Settlement, Azle, River Oaks, Sansom Park, Lake Worth, Eagle Mountain, Briar, Pecan Acres, Willow Park, Reno, Aledo, Springtown, Westworth Village, Hudson Oaks, Pelican Bay, Rhome and Haslet. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
